commands.title: Web Clipper: Clip Web Page Inline

webClipper.autoShowPreviewToSide.description: Automatically open a preview to the side after a page is clipped.

webClipper.outputTemplate.markdownDescription:
A custom template that the results will be interpolated into. Use ${result} for the Mercury result object and ${markdown} for the converted Markdown.  
A list of Mercury result properties can be found [here](https://github.com/postlight/mercury-parser#usage).  
Edit this setting in the JSON settings editor to show line breaks properly.

webClipper.inlineTemplate.markdownDescription:
A custom template for inline clipping. Use ${result} for the Mercury result object and ${markdown} for the converted Markdown.  
A list of Mercury result properties can be found [here](https://github.com/postlight/mercury-parser#usage).  
Edit this setting in the JSON settings editor to show line breaks properly.

webClipper.turndownOptions.markdownDescription: Options to pass to Turndown. A list of valid options can be found [here](https://github.com/domchristie/turndown#options). Advanced options are not supported.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
